title: Cant go on the shop
body: When i boot up the client, i try to access the shop and it says i cant. Any one know how to buy skins and champs?

replies.body:
The alpha client is currently bear bones. There is no access to the shop, ranked games, Hextech Crafting, Twisted Treeline or RGM at this time.

To access these functions, please use the legacy client
